name: Warp Boost
description:
Story

While experimenting with your warp machine you suddenly find yourself in an alternative dimension. There isn't much to see just darkness around you. You see the warp point above you. Luckily you happened to be wearing your spacesuit which has a boost function which kicks in as soon as you move. Your objective now is to get to the warp point and get back home. 

Instructions

Navigate up using left and right arrow keys to engage your boosters. 

Can you reach the warp zone in the lowest number of boosts? 

Info

This is a simple arcade game built with Phaser3. It is platformer where you need to avoid the platforms and navigate around them. This game was built while participating in the Brackeys Gamejam. This is my first game jam and first game :) 

Feedback welcome!

Web based, chrome preferably. Not mobile friendly. 

Art created by me. 

Audio taken from these packs:  (Thank you!)
https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack

https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx
